website_summaries.verdict: A powerful defuzzer that's comfortable to operate. The large lint collector can hold more than other models, saving time spent emptying.
pros: Bigger than other models on the market with a 2.5-inch shaving surface
Features a rechargeable battery, or can be plugged straight into an outlet
Comes with two spare stainless steel blades, a cleaning brush, and a drawstring bag for storage
cons: There are no replacement blades available for this model

website_summaries.verdict: Tops its competitors with power, performance, and versatility.
pros: A powerful — yet safe —machine that effectively removes lint from almost any material
Can be used with electric cord or batteries
cons: You might not want to spend almost $40 for a lint remover, but you will get your money's worth with this model

customer_reviews.title: Should Be Recalled
customer_reviews.text: At first this item worked great however, after only 3 uses the motor started wearing down. Even when plugged in the motor sounds like it's running slower than it used to and it takes a lot more passes to get the pills and fuzz off. This item was only used on normal clothing with very minor fuzz. There is no reason for the rapid decline in the quality of this product. The only recommendation I can give is to place this product on a recall list as it meets the criteria to qualify as a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Received this today and within minutes my sweater looked like new. The photo below shows the transformation from ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this today and within minutes my sweater looked like new. The photo below shows the transformation from pill covered sweater to smooth and fresh looking. I laid it flat on the carpet and ran the shaver over it lightly. No problems with it catching or tearing holes. So happy to have something to keep my sweaters looking good. Now if someone could just come up with a way to stop them from pilling in the first place...
customer_reviews.author: Indianame

customer_reviews.title: amazing! I am also working on a sweater and ...
customer_reviews.text: This fabric shaver works miracles. I thought my cats definitely ruined my couch. Look at the before and after pics... amazing! I am also working on a sweater and it does take longer to get rid of the sweater fuzz; you just have to be patient.
customer_reviews.author: nmcraven

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this very expensive lint remover to remove lint and also to remove fuzz off some dining chairs I have. However, this product does not work. I've tried it with multiple applications in the week I've owned it and it fails to remove lint and fuzz on every item I've used it on. There is never any fuzz in the collection cup either. I tried changing out the blades with no improvement. This item cost over $35 and does not work. Read the fine print closely, because it also states NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES, which stinks when you get a dud unit. I'm very frustrated. I've never purchased a product on amazon that had a NO return policy.
customer_reviews.author: DelanaBoBana

customer_reviews.title: Big and worthless with Defective Motor
customer_reviews.text: Within the first week of using the motor would go on and off, the wire that hold the blade in place broke I had to hold the cord in a certain position for it to work. Not thinking I could return it since this was my first Amazon purchase. I kept using it until within a month or so the cord/wiring that attaches to the area completely broke. I hardly got any use out of it and very disappointed because I had recently bought a battery operated shaver and the batteries die easily so I decided to pay more for an electric shaver but just a waste of money. Wish the company would take this back.
customer_reviews.author: Mile High Denver Deals

customer_reviews.title: BROKE IMMEDIATELY AND NO RETURNS?????????? What????
customer_reviews.text: SERIOUSLY SERIOUSLY DON’T BUY. Opened it today. Used it on 1 sweater for 3 minutes and now it won’t turn on! I just went to return it and it says it’s not refundable which is NOT STATED!!!!!!! Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: acs

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself some money and buy a cheaper one. This thing lasted no more than a half hour before the motor started dying, WHILE IT WAS PLUGGED IN. Contacted customer service, no response. They do NOTHING to correct the problem. COMPLETE RIP OFF. I do not recommend. I have a cheap one I found on ebay that I paid $12 for. Over a year ago and it still works. I only bought this expensive one for a backup and wanted to see if there was any difference. The only difference is now I'm out the $35 dollars, their customer service is GARBAGE TOO.
customer_reviews.author: DW80

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: After buying a pair of sweatpants from a souvenir shop, I was disappointed with the quality after a one time wear, and was ready to throw them in the garbage. I decided to try this product expecting no more than "as-seen-on-TV" results, but am completely wrong. It removed all the obnoxious lint balls easily and restored my pants back to looking brand new again. This is the lint collected from just the front, showing the difference from the back that I haven't used it on yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L.

customer_reviews.title: I immediately tried this unit and it worked great. However
customer_reviews.text: I immediately tried this unit and it worked great. However, on the 2nd day, the shaver made a LOUD whirring noise. I emailed the seller and turns out maybe the blade was defective? Anyway, they told me to use the spare blade that came with it to see if it fixed the loud sound (it seriously sounded like a jet engine!). I put in the second blade and I have not had issues. They sent me a spare but it took over a month to get to me! (From Australia). Overall, I love this shaver. It returned my sweaters back to decent looking status and did not snag or chew off fabric as other shavers have done.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: My $10 sweater shaver worked better
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the unit to clean up several causal v-neck sweaters from Brooks Brothers. The unit performed poorly... very little fizz or napping removed. I tried it on a Polo sweater and experienced the same result. My $10 sweater shaver from a local Bed-Bath store performed better. I suspect the House of Wonderful unit may be for something heavier or with material with a deeper pile such as blanket? Anyway, it simply didn’t work on nice sweater (one of which was cashmere).
customer_reviews.author: Early Stage Exec

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed two cashmere sweaters on first use!
customer_reviews.text: I am too angry right now for words. I purchased this product after much research through Amazon reviews and was ready to upgrade from an old battery-powered sweater shaver. I am extremely careful and to be gentle and smooth my fabrics so as to not snag holes. Maybe the holes on the screen are too large; this device is too powerful for cashmere and I will now be spending at least $50 to have these three holes repaired. Do NOT use this on ANY gentle knits. Stick to carpets, upholstery only.
customer_reviews.author: Phil H.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy can't return when it breaks
customer_reviews.text: I've had it all but 12 days and it died. I figured it's a prime product maybe I can exchange it. OH NO! They don't accept returns?! Why in the world not? If I would have know that I wouldn't have bought it in the first place! Don't bother, 30+ dollars down the drain. This sat in my cart for 2 months before I made the purchase, now it's going in the garbage. Thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbelyn Hilgenfeld

customer_reviews.title: High-end and high-quality defuzzer at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough great things about this electric defuzzer! I'm absolutely in love and obsessed with it because it makes my clothes look new. Not only does it remove all the fuzz, but it also sort of irons the fabric and removes wrinkles as it defuzzes. This is more than the average defuzzer, but if you want to invest in something that's going to last and do a good job then this defuzzer is worth the money. I also like the way it looks; it's aesthetically pleasing: it looks nice in my closet, especially because it comes with a soft velvet string bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be Very Nice...I Wouldn’t Know
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived cracked all over. It’s very large and quite frankly, doesn’t seem like it would be worth the extra money. It’s MUCH more expensive but since it’s cracked all over, I can’t really use it as it’s intended. Now that it has arrived, I’m not sold on paying 4x more for essentially the same product as every other one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kalex824

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is the best thing I have bought in ages. I have limped along with a small comb defuzzer for years. All the reviews were great for this one and I am not disappointed. I have immediately taken some clothes that look like they were ready for the rag pile and made them look brand new. I am defuzzing like crazy and could not be happier. I feel like I should buy one of these for everybody I know just to make their life a little bit better!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job on sweaters
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Lint Shaving device twice since buying it. It is easy to use, works quite well and so far creates no damage to my clothing. I used it on a wool blend sweater/jacket and a wool blend sweater - both good quality garments that pilled badly. What I learned is that de-pilling or shaving a garment is a bit of a laborious job. This particular device is easy to use, but you do have to lay out your garment flat and work in a systemized way to carefully cover everything - it took awhile to really go over my entire cardigan sweater. It does look much better so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: lexigirl

customer_reviews.title: It is a good idea to practice a little bit on an old ...
customer_reviews.text: This lint shaver worked wonders and restored some life into some of our old shirts and sweaters. It is a good idea to practice a little bit on an old shirt you don't want before trying in on something that's near and dear to you. Making sure that the shirt is flat (there aren't any folds in the fabric) + not pressing too hard = amazing results! So why only four stars? Unfortunately, we had to use it with batteries since the AC adaptor didn't work. :( With a working adaptor, five stars for sure!
customer_reviews.author: 12 Gauge Padawan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage but packaged well.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the packaging and looks of this lint shaver scream quality, but Unfortunately on the 3rd use the motor started to run at half speed and smell of burning bearings. It has been completely useless ever since. I have a $40 paperweight now. I'm hoping that I can return it since I only purchased it a few months ago. I will update this review if that happens. Based on the reviews I'm sure that I just got a lemon but it still stings.
customer_reviews.author: Scotti Norman

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to let everyone know this item works great. I thought it was a little expensive when ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't write that many reviews, however; I wanted to let everyone know this item works great. I thought it was a little expensive when I purchased it, but I read the reviews that said it made their clothes look like new and it does. I figure it is worth the money, because you are not getting rid of the clothing that has those little lint balls all over them. I had another less expensive model and this new one works so much better and faster. The old one is going in the donation box instead of my clothes. .
customer_reviews.author: cfrajt Woodstock, GA

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! I bought some West elm couches that unfortunately pill easily. I use the lint shaver to keep them looking brand new, and it works amazingly! I've also use these on my high priced leggings and sweaters to keep them looking new and shave pills off. It's gentle yet strong I haven't had any accidents with shaving a hole into anything. I use it with the AC adapter.it's actually a very quiet and satisfying sound to hear the little pills being cut off. I would buy this a thousand times over.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Porter

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this item so very much. It is nice again to be able to use a shaver and not have to put new batteries in numerous times as I did the last time I used the smaller shaver I have. The option to use the adapter is one reason I bought this item to begin with. It does a wonderful job and the larger size helps to speed up the time it takes to shave an item. My daughter-in-law told me she wanted one for Christmas! Had a similar shaver years ago which lasted a long time. Am excited to once again have one that utilizes and adapater.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: My sofa is back to looking new
customer_reviews.text: I was feeling some nubby threads on my sofa. I contacted the manufacturer and they recommended using a battery-powered lint remover. This was the best quality I could find here. It took me about 20 minutes to carefully, slowly go over the single cushion of my couch (one long cushion) - along the seat area and the front edge. Really, the thing looks brand new again! I tried it next on a sweater fabric duster (a coat without buttons) and it took off all the lint balls on it, too. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mosie Osie

customer_reviews.title: Pill remover
customer_reviews.text: The unit works well, and fortunately they now offer replacement blades (although we haven't had it long enough to wear out a blade). I was confused by the battery / AC in the ad. I somehow assumed it was rechargeable. It is NOT. It can run on an AC adapter (which has a longer than usual cord--nice touch) or on 4 C cells. But batteries are not included and it is not intended to recharge batteries. That diminished its cost effectiveness in my eyes, but still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Wilton

customer_reviews.title: Great fuze ball remover and Does Not Require Batteries
customer_reviews.text: This product is used to remove those tiny sometimes large lint balls. I have burned up many other brands but not this one. It is amazing. So amazing I bought some to give as Christmas gifts. This is well worth the money. I am not burning through costly batteries any more. I where a lot of cardigans and this is a must have and is built well.
customer_reviews.author: Robin H

customer_reviews.title: So Far so Good
customer_reviews.text: The day I received my WonderLint I took it out of the box and hooked it up. I got out (3) cashmere sweaters and went to work, it performed beautifully. I've owned battery operated in the past which are convenient but this is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: hollywood123

customer_reviews.title: Clean finish!
customer_reviews.text: This fabric shaver leaves a smooth fabric surface. The handle size is large enough to get a good grip. The shaver head is large enough to smooth the fabric as you go. It even does cuff edges cleanly. Wall plug cord is long enough to use with an ironing board as your surface.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Really smooths fabric again!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a fabric shaver and purchased several battery powered ones that did not meet my needs. I have a darling cat that despite 12 cat scratchers likes to use my micro fiber couch to scratch on leaving pills in the fabric. The battery powered shavers did nothing. The House of Wonderful Wonder lint remover left my couch fabric smooth again! I was amazed! I had given up hope! Don’t let the “plug in” feature of this fabric shaver steer you towards what seems to be a more convenient battery powered option- they are not as good as this one!
customer_reviews.author: clarissa l pegram

customer_reviews.title: One of the best!
customer_reviews.text: I had to headline this way because I have over the years used many options to clear off those darned balls of fluff that gather on all sweaters. None has been as effective at the Wonder Lint. Thanks for finally providing a product that works well. I used to just get rid of the sweater, but no more!
customer_reviews.author: Phil E. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: The best of the lot!
customer_reviews.text: Sweaters pill. It’s just a fact. This is the most effective shaver I have found. It has a larger shaving surface so you can work a wider area with each pass and you can power it with batteries or a cord. Even so, it takes time and consistent application to keep your clothes looking good. Buy it, use it. It’s a wise investment.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Largest Shaving Surface on the Market, & an EXTRA Large Lint Collector. Best You Will Ever Find!!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is the Very Best on the Market! Take it with you when you travel, and have it ready to use at home on literally anything needy of removing unwanted lint---ALL fabrics of clothing, blankets, pillowcases, and even your fabric covered furniture . Absolutely NO hint of lint, fuzz, or even pulls left behind. A Must Have in every household, especially with winter fabrics more prevalent---gloves, socks, sweaters, coats, & any surface with lint.
customer_reviews.author: ~schoolpeach~

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: Let’s be real - we can’t stand those little fuzzies on our clothes. While most people would never notice them, we do, and it’s annoying. Behold, the eliminator of fuzzies! I got to work with my new toy immediately, and now my robe, lounge pants, old T-shirt’s, and hoodies all feel like new. No more bumpy textures on the worn parts! Incredibly easy to use, cord powered or cordless with (4) C-batteries, great results, comfortable ergonomic design, and effortless cleanup. My only wish is that rather than the 4 batteries it was rechargeable, but after about 3 hours of use the batteries are holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad I paid a little more for this product; it is worth it. It can operate with batteries or with electricity. I used it with electricity and it worked great. My new black polar fleece jacket that looked old and pilled after only one wash, now looks new again! I also like that the pills are sucked up into a container and all the accessories and and the unit are stored in their own little bag.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!! Best purchase to extend life of clothing
customer_reviews.text: I probably spend more time shaving sweaters than my legs. I had always used smaller, battery powered shavers, but saw a recommendation for this product. I love it. It's larger than the smaller, compact shavers, so it covers a larger surface area. And the corded power supply ensures the batteries don't poop out mid shave. As a young professional, this is great for personal use. It keeps all my cardigans looking new in the office. And as a clothing reseller, it gives new life to discarded items someone deemed no good. Five stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much!
customer_reviews.text: I love love this thing! As soon as it arrived, I was skeptical about something being able to "shave" the pilling on my wools / knits so I pulled out my worst culprits right away. I was not only shocked about how much lint the removable tray caught, but how clean (and new) my worst pieces looked. I ended up de-pilling every sweater & knit top in my closet just to see how powerful this little thing is --and it has not let me down. I also love that they included another blade and cleaning brush. I make sure to clean it after every single use to prolong its life.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny212

customer_reviews.title: This product exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded expectations. We had purchased a sofa from West Elm and shortly after we purchased it, it began to get pile all over it. I had tried other products which worked marginally well. However, with the first use of this product, it worked without a hitch and actually filled up the collection container. The one potential "negative" is being restricted by the length of the cord. However, a "pro" would def be the fact that the machine uses electricity instead of battery power. This gives you the same strength and results from start to finish. It also worked equally well on wool sweaters as well.
customer_reviews.author: Westm_

customer_reviews.title: Truly the best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had a newer couch that was full of pills. This cleaned-up our upholstery fabric so that it once again looks like new. It did not catch, came with an easy to empty pill container, and left a smooth finish on the fabric. I highly recommend this. Powerful enough for upholstery yet perfect for sweaters and clothing as well. Our microfiber sweaters are also looking new again!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: This does not work. I'm a little disappointed that I ordered it and it sat on my shelf before I used it but it does not work. Purchase at your own peril
customer_reviews.author: Flower_of_Asgard

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver on the market
customer_reviews.text: Strong and comes with extra blades and blades are available for sale - Many other brands are useless as they do not offer blade replacements for sale rendering them useless when blades have worn out - Ridiculous and poor marketing - Buyers of other brands need to research carefully before buying!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective, but takes time
customer_reviews.text: The shaver works wonders and helped me clean up a knit cardigan that was developing fuzz so badly, an old cotton blazer, and a badly pilled pair of fleece tights. It does take some time to finish one item of clothing because you need to make several passes to get the pills off. I do wish it were more efficient at shaving off the pills in one pass. But, this could actually still be a positive thing because it is more gentle to the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: RS79

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I eagerly anticipated this item, however, it had no effect on the pills/lint on my sofa or sweaters. After much effort, both sofa and sweater looked exactly the same prior to use.
customer_reviews.author: Makenzi Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: When the shaver arrived, it immediately had problems. When plugged in it worked well. When running on battery you had to hold the battery door in place and push down on the on/off button to keep it running. We don't use it frequently (maybe every 3-4 months for our couch cushions) but the on/off switch became an increasingly difficult problem each time. I just tried to use it and the switch mechanism is dead. This product was rated highly but I must say it has only been a disappointment to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mccormack

customer_reviews.title: Decent sometimes time consuming
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent sweater shaver. It is very ergonomic and easy to handle. Love that I can just plug it in. Comes with bag, cleaning stuff and extra blades. Cons it does take some work to get your desired results and some sweater/shirt shavings will drift out from the catch area when in use. Overall happy to have to extend the life and look of my well loved tops.
customer_reviews.author: Mach

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lint shaver! I have used it on sweaters I thought I would have to throw away!! It is much bigger than my previous lint shavers and plugs in the wall so no more constantly replacing batteries! It works so well I used it on my couch cushions! I would give it 100 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Throw away your Prozac and get happy!
customer_reviews.text: Has made my sweaters look new again. The speed and ease of use of this sweater "deballer" far surpasses all other smaller devices I have used. It is actually so fast and fun and satisfying that you will even be wanting to do all your family and friends' sweaters! Well make and well worth the money you spend.
customer_reviews.author: H. Shatto

customer_reviews.title: Removed pilling from several items
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the reviews for this item, I ordered it and received it quickly. I have since used it on my winter coat, which had pilling all over it, and it worked great. I also used it on my sweaters and flannel sheets. In the past, I had tried using a razor to shave off the pilling, but ended up putting holes in my sweaters. Glad I found this lint remover.
customer_reviews.author: Kpomera1

customer_reviews.title: Great to use on wool.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on a YouTube video. I had purchased a smaller one previously but I needed something more substantial. I used it on an Orvis Merino Wool sweater that was super pilly and the sweater is gorgeous now. Not a pill in sight. There is no adjustable guard on this one so be careful. You must lay it flat. I used it on a knit dress without the same results as the sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Dextersmom

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this on 3 sweaters. It works just like my previous lint shaver made by Sunbeam, which suddenly stopped after about a year of use. Hopefully this will hold up longer. I like that it comes with two extra replacement blades and a fabric case for storage so you can recycle the original packaging. I hope the motor holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Blnde1

customer_reviews.title: multi use
customer_reviews.text: I've used this so many times in just the first week. It did a great job on my sweaters--they look like new again! I also used it on my sofa and a chair. My sofa was looking a little "used" and I ran this over the sofa after cleaning it and what a difference! I'm so pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barely Used it When it Broke
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay until a week outside the return the window when it broke. I’ve barely used it. I’m not happy at all as it was one of the more expensive models listed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Would not turn on!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this about a year ago and just opened it up. When I tried to use it with batteries it wouldn’t turn on. I also attempted to use the power cord but it wouldn’t turn on with that method either. Since I ordered it so long ago, I can’t return it so now I’ve just got to waste the dollars spent. If you order, check it as soon as it arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Wonder Lint clothes shaver. I have used smaller lint shavers from various sellers but this larger shaver is great. It covers more fabric and is so easy to use. It shipped fast and was exactly as described. I haven't had any issues with it. Everything works as advertised. Again, I am so happy that I found this item, so are my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: MsBlesst

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I have so many sweatshirts and leggings that have pilled from my washer. This tool is the best at getting rid of all the pilling! It's gentle on even my most expensive leggings. I only use it plugged in, I haven't been able to put batteries in it yet to use it wirelessly. It's small enough to travel with as well and comes with an easy travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to extend wardrobe life
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I brought it to my Mom's for her to borrow as well, and she loved it, it made her very old sweaters that she was going to get rid of look much more wearable! Big tank so you don't have to empty often, easy to use, impossible to cut your sweater as far as I can tell. Nice that it comes with a bag and an extra blade as well!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: No regrets just need a lot of time!
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not write reviews but this one definitely needed one! For Christmas, I received a beautiful wool cardigan. After a few days of wear it started to have pills all over it making it look old and ugly. I finally made the leap and purchased this "wonder lint". Let me just say money well spent; however, it was a long battle of having to move over the same spots multiple times before I got it to look like new! Patience is a must as this machine slowly removes pills and fuzz from my cardigan! I don't regret the purchase but I foresee many of hours lost against the battle of fuzz.
customer_reviews.author: Felmo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, amazing, best defuzzer ever
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is amazing. I’ve used two of the ‘popular’ battery brands for years and they NEVER performed as well as the Wonder Lint. I defuzzed one sleeve in under 5 minutes. The cuffs and underarms look new. I’m no longer ashamed of my new hoodie. Yep, it’s only a few months old, but now looks brand new. (I wear it everyday) Thank you Wonder Lint! I’m a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: Gift from god!
customer_reviews.text: I iron and lint roll my clothes (because who wants to look sloppy right?) and I don’t know how I’ve made it this long without this device in my life. It took clothing articles I would have thrown away, and made them look brand new. This device will pay for itself in the clothes I now don’t have to throw away. It has to be plugged in while in use, but they give you a long plug in cord.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Stuber

customer_reviews.title: Strong and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is the third brand we have used and by far the best. Well worth the investment to have something cordless that holds the charge and works really well to keep our sweaters looking great!
customer_reviews.author: Daveb

customer_reviews.title: Feels well-made, but does not power well.
customer_reviews.text: What I liked about this item was the way it felt like it was well made, and heavy. It did not feel cheap. However, it does not give me the results on my clothes that I was expecting. I tried using it with batteries and with the power cord, and it does not work well either way. Will be returning for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: LambGlam

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: This product pretty well works as advertised for the most part. I do have to continually go over the same area of clothing numerous times to get all the pills and can be somewhat time consuming depending on the fabric or article and clothing and how bad it is but does work and removes most fuzz and pills. Easy to clean though the blades must be cleaned after each use because if not you will have build up of fuzz around the blades. Overall good product for the money and will make your sweaters look almost like new.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Works great on couches
customer_reviews.text: This shaver worked great on my couches. They look so much cleaner and better and the shaver was easy to use. I just used it on a sweater too and it worked great. Just make sure you don’t push down on the fabric too hard or you could snag it. And don’t shave over any threads that are attached to your couch or sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: Nbirdj

customer_reviews.title: Like a face lift for your clothes!
customer_reviews.text: I have several sweaters that I absolutely love. Additionally, I have noticed that some of the newer clothing materials seem to pill like bunnies on a mission. In the process of spring cleaning, I was going to toss some of my favorite things. I hesitated and then came across this lint remover. Every single piece I have used it on looks completely refreshed! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent !
customer_reviews.text: This was wayyy worth the money! ") Yes it's not cheap but you get what you pay for! Tried the it on my Nike leggings because it started to get little fuzz balls on them, and now it looks & feels as good as new! ") I even did my Gymshark slounge leggings too , and now it also looks & feels as good as new! Money well spent! Not even worth 2nd guessing if u should buy or not !
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on positive reviews I read here and it meets my expectations. While it cost four times as much as smaller battery operated fans busters, it can be used with electricity instead of batteries and is less tedious to use because of the relatively large razor surface. I have buzzed a few sweaters and they look presentable again. Still using the blade that came nested in the device and there are two more in the storage box. To operate the device without damaging fabric, I lay the clothing on an ironing board next to a window for the best visibility. It's probably overpriced for the technology but valuable for adding wear time to clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Enthusiastic participant

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for 1 yr
customer_reviews.text: And I barely used it. It only works if I turn it upside down making it useless. I wish I could get my money back as I assumed a higher priced product would be better than the cheap ones i get from discount stores. I’m going to get a cheap on so if it does conk out I would be as upset as i am now.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST GADGET EVER!!!! You can replace the blades because I have twice now
customer_reviews.text: I first wanna tell you that You can most def buy replacement blades. I have no idea why people say you can’t because I have bought them.... This is the Best lint remover ever!!! It revived every piece of clothing I had!!! It will make an old sweater new again. It’s just awesome!!!!! Even on my jeans
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Grihorash

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works!!! I was getting ready to throw out all of my couch pillows because they had so much pilling on them that they actually looked dirty. This little handheld machine made light work of it! Fuzz to this machine is akin to cookies to cookie Monster!! The product came fast and exceeded all of my expectations! Not to mention, some weird part of me got a strange sense of satisfaction watching the fuzz balls disappear! lol Trust me, you will understand when you get one!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: The best lint remover I have ever purchased. I used it on shirts, sweaters and furniture. They also sent extra blades, which should last me a long time. Absolutely amazed by how well this product worked at reviving old garments, they look like new. Friends were also impressed and plan on buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Daf B.

customer_reviews.title: This de-fuzzer works.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased similar looking battery powered de-fuzz gadgets in the past and all either died quickly or did not work well. This lint remover plugs in and is much more robust in construction. It de-pilled a polo shirt and de-fuzzed a sweater with no problems and worked really really well. It also came with a spare blade. Very happy with it, works as described and did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Kate F

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this item based on the rating and number of reviews, and it really does the job. There are some knits that it hasn't worked on, but I used it on our cut velvet sofas to get those tiny little pulls (made by the cats) off and it was spectacular at removing them -- sofas look brand new. Plus it does a great job on lots of our clothing to get those nasty pills off. I think it's worth the price, well made, and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank O. File

customer_reviews.title: Nice High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great seller!! I have had several of these over the years but nothing made this well. It works beautifully on my sectional and pillows and never a snag or damage to my fabric. The large shaver head allows me to cover more area in a faster period of time. The handle makes it very easy to hold and maneuver. Extremely pleased with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: SherryR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I loved my House of Wonderful Wonder Lint Sweater Shaver so much, I purchased one as a gift. It keeps the sweaters looking free of pills without damaging the sweater. It holds a charge for a long time too and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: BeWarm

customer_reviews.title: Makes my sweater look new again!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it twice so I can’t attest to its longevity but it works well. I had a small struggle trying to find my rhythm on the different kinds of material I was running it over — be sure to be more careful on delicate fabrics — but I filled the trimmer twice in just one sweater! My sweaters look newer. My tops don’t bug me with scratchy pills. I wish I had purchased it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: RUSTEN S. SCHROEDER

customer_reviews.title: It was great for the first few uses - then died
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the shaver I loved it. I resell clothes so this is a helpful too to help revitalize sweaters. However after the first several uses, the motor started slowing and then start/stopping. But after only 1 month of use, the motor died. For a higher end shaver this is ridiculous. They provide extra blades, but they should provide extra motors...ha! So disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Schneggenburger

customer_reviews.title: This Fety Sweater Shaver does an amazing job
customer_reviews.text: I had a small sweater shaver a while ago and this was by and far a much better product. I had 3 sweaters that were just too covered with fuzz balls to save until I gave this product a shot. I now have three more sweaters that look great and are back in my closet. This saved a lot of money in a few minutes. Thanks. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Occasional lapse in power after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to learn how to properly use this w/ heavy pilling. Basically you need to stretch your garment so it's very flat to get a really good shave and this can lead to holes if you aren't careful. Granted I used this for an hour or so here and there on the first go, but I wouldn't expect a product w/ a satisfaction guarantee to have a significant power loss after just a couple of hours of use. I was using the power cord, not the battery. Currently it functions w/ intermittent full power and decreased power. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: FdlC

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: I had sewn a flannel rag quilt and washed and dried it. What a mess! I thought I'd have to throw away because it was so badly pilled. This product came and it was like magic. The beginning of a family heirloom went from scrap to a beautiful gift once again. The customer service was quick to reply and went above and beyond! I never give 5 stars byt this one deserved it!
customer_reviews.author: 1Roach

customer_reviews.title: MOTOR IS NOT ROTATING PROPERLY - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: My total usage is less than 10 minutes and the motor is not rotating properly. This product is NOT WORKING properly. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Indira

customer_reviews.title: Game changing for your wardrobe.
customer_reviews.text: A blogger recommended this product. I bought it, it’s a game changer. It works on everything my old sweaters little fuzzies on my carpet fuzzies on my jacket. I can’t use it enough- it is amazing and worth every penny. I have gifted it. I seriously have saved so many amazing sweaters using this, they look brand new and I am so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I don’t need batteries for this shaver. I love that it’s big and I can shave longer without having to constantly dump the collection as often as I did with my smaller shavers. I’m glad I can purchase replacements blades. This shaver will still snag some fabrics so beware and be careful. The price tag was a bit high in my opinion however, considering the benefits I’d say it was well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Wells

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has a plug in option. I use it a lot so I prefer not paying for batteries. The greatest compliment I can give this product is that after I used it on my husbands old sweater, friends complimented him on his new sweater. This is my most favorite product, it’s simple to use and actually fun to see the before and after.
customer_reviews.author: Tigard L

customer_reviews.title: Amazed by Shaver...
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 fleeces jackets which were so covered in little fur balls that they were pretty much unusable. I got the shaver and gave it a try. I was amazed how well it worked. I did both outside and inside and got a kick at how well it worked. I showed the jackets to my wife and she could not believe they were the same jackets. Nicely made with extra blades. The fur balls are collected in a a front panel which was easy to remove, clean and pop back on. Highly recommend this product, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: SteveO

customer_reviews.title: opened it immediately and used it on all my sweaters that had bad multi-colored lint after being washed
customer_reviews.text: I got mine today, opened it immediately and used it on all my sweaters that had bad multi-colored lint after being washed. This thing worked perfectly on al of them, had to empty it a few times. Then I used it on a coat that always had very bad lint and it’s now 100% lint free. Very pleased with this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cat lover

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival, not a good quality design
customer_reviews.text: It is already broken when arrived. One of the blades fell off and was making rattling noice upon first use.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Defuzzer
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Read reviews on different ones before purchasing. Decided that even if it could have problems the company seemed to respond to buyers responses and questions so I felt comfortable buying it. It's easy to use and you don't have to worry about putting batteries in unless you need it somewhere not near an outlet. Shirts looked and felt like new after I used it.
customer_reviews.author: W. N. Wakai

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye bumps
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I was waiting for this to arrive and work it's magic! I'm thoroughly impressed! It plugs right into a standard outlet and presto... look at my picture and you will see that one side is smooth and the other side hasn't been shaved yet. Clearly a phenomenal product!
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: WOW ... Wonder Lint works better than expected. I have a black cashmere sweater that looked very ratty. Fuzz balls and fuzz covered the entire sweater. It was so bad I was embarrassed to wear it anymore. After about two hours it looks nearly new. I can wear my favorite sweater again. Then, I spent about 30 minutes on my daughter's favorite hoody - again like new. Be aware, you really need a flat surface such as a counter or ironing board. It works better, won't take as long, and you'll have better results. Using an ironing board and situating the garment on the ironing board as if you were ironing it works best.
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job removing piles from rib knit on jackets. Easy to handle. light weight. Empties very easy. Large capacity pile holder. Like the fact that it does come with power cord.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy for use on less than year old Lazy Boy couch...product works great on fabric..wouldn’t recommend a Lazy Boy though!
customer_reviews.author: Pam G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this!! I’ve thought about getting one for years but I never saw an electric one. First, the cord is longer than I expected. * Second, it has a generous container for the unwanted lint. * Third, the blades are quite sharp and of good quality.* And last, it has a nice bag to put it all in!! I can hardly wait to use it on some of my linty sweaters!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Overbeck

customer_reviews.title: Works miracles!
customer_reviews.text: By hands down the best sweater shaver I've ever used! I've used smaller and cheaper ones from other companies and those have fallen apart quite quickly and I tend to use my daily for work and personal use. It works wonders and miracles! My brother borrowed it recently for a sweater that I was going to donate due to the endless amounts of pilling it had, you couldn't even see the original design due to all the pilling, after we shaved the sweater it seriously looked brand new!!! Wow! I now know what I am getting him for Christmas! Seriously worth the money, if you are willing to invest in a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have a favorite sweatshirt that started balling up under the arms. This worked great on sweatshirt fabric. I pulled a balled-up brand-new sweater out of the give-away box and removed the balls from that. It was a very loose-weave knit and this made it about 75% better. Very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: ... but I did spend the money to buy a good one of these
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing to compare this to but I did spend the money to buy a good one of these. This one is freaking awesome!!! Like I defuzz my clothes and scarves and blankets for fun. If you are one of those people who gets super excited about how much dirt comes out of your rug with a steam cleaner or really good vacuum ...same. This is so exciting and your stuff goes from being crappy and ratty to nice again. Just the savings I got from a couple of scarves and things saved me the money I spent on this. I love it. It’s what I’m getting everyone for Christmas next year. ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I agree fully with the positive reviews I read on this product before I ordered it. It arrived quickly and I used it on our newer sofa that had begun to pill and it looked good as new in no time. The packaging is great and the extra blades as well as the ability to plug it in rather than use up the batteries is wonderful. I'm hoping that I don't have the motor issues others have written about. So far it seems to be working great.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Counters

customer_reviews.title: New household staple!
customer_reviews.text: Why have I only just heard of this product?! This is a must have for anyone! It has changed my life for the better! I use it for my clothes and anytime I wash my couch cushions. It saved me from buying a new couch. It is safe and I've never had any issues with this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: great clothes shaver
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy it was to use this product. It also works really well, and takes all the fuzz and little pills off my clothes easily. It is a little tough to get the fuzz out of the receptacle but it isn't a deal breaker, because otherwise, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: L. ADAMS RAYBORN

customer_reviews.title: Best fabric shaver that is worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: The best fabric shaver I've ever used. Who knew that the battery powered ones I had before were so underpowered and ineffective? This one plugs in (also optional batteries) and is so powerful yet does not damage clothing. I shaved my cashmere sweaters and they look as good as new! Dont hesitate because this is one of those things that totally changes how you feel about a fabric shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: works well!  causes holes if not careful!
customer_reviews.text: BE CAREFUL! This does take fuzz off t-shirts, but make sure your fabric is nice a flat. If there are any areas where the fabric is bunched it will put a hole in the fabric!
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Favorite amazon buy!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! I used it on my slip cover linen couches that had lint all over. It made them look brand new. Also used it on a coat that had frayed where velcro had constantly rubbed. Looks brand new as well. Very satisfied and would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and finally got around to using this past weekend. It did not last more than 2 min an died. I tried the battery option and that did not work. Very disappointed and I am past the return window!
customer_reviews.author: Kate crane

customer_reviews.title: faulty switch contact operation
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after a few months. Opened it up and saw the switch does not always engage the contact arms properly. It appears mfg has added a piece to correct for this but it seems to still not work. Luckily I am moderately handy and could bend the top contact arm down to improve the operation. Sometimes though it still doesn't work right and the switch needs to be jiggled. In any case - poor construction. My advice, spend less money on the soft touch and fancy logo and get your switch right.
customer_reviews.author: Vala Mohr

product_meta.title: House of Wonderful Wonder Lint Best Rated Electric Fabric Shaver Best Fuzz Pill Bobble Remover for Clothes Sweaters Fleece Curtains
feature_bullets: WANT TO FRESHEN UP YOUR HOME? The Wonder Lint breathes new life into all kinds of fabrics you may have feared were long gone, including clothing, furniture, curtains, drapery, sheets, blankets, duvets & comforters. So, for a cleaner, fresher looking home, you can’t beat the Wonder Lint!

WANT TO SAVE MONEY & THE ENVIRONMENT? Why waste money and create landfill by throwing away tired clothes and furniture when in a matter of a few minutes, the Wonder Lint can leave them looking and feeling brand new again. So, invest in the superior quality of the Wonder Lint today and start counting the $000’s it saves you! ****100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE **** If you're not fully satisfied with your Wonder Lint, we will refund your purchase no questions asked.

WANT TO BRING YOUR FAMILY’S FAVORITE CLOTHES BACK TO LIFE? Do you have a much-loved sweater you no longer wear because it’s covered in lint? Is your child’s favourite blanket starting to look a little bobbly? Do the pulls in your leggings stop you from pulling them on? If the answer is yes, then let the Wonder Lint work its magic. But be warned, once you start using it and see the results, you won’t be able to stop!

WANT A STAR PERFORMER? The Wonder Lint is super-fast and easy to use. It removes all lint and pilling very quickly, and the blades last a long time. The lint trap is large enough to not need frequently emptying and is easy to clean out. It also has an easy hold grip and a super long cord, but also takes batteries. All in all, it’s great value for money.
WANT REPLACEABLE BLADES? Experience the wonder of the Wonder Lint year after year. Search for ASIN B07CWNH4H1.
